item.title: How To Make Money Blogging
item.description:
How To Make Money Blogging

A Step-By-Step Guide To Make Money Blogging Share This Page How You Can Start Welcome to the Entrepreneurs-Journey guide to set up a profitable website or blog. This page is a starting point to help you with three core objectives - Highlight the most relevant and valuable resources buried within...

item.title: The Most Entertaining Guide to Landing Page Optimization You'll Ever Read
item.description:
The Most Entertaining Guide to Landing Page Optimization You'll Ever Read

If you've ever been bored while reading a blog post, your life just got better. If you've ever wanted to learn about conversion rate optimization, and how to design high-converting landing pages, without falling asleep, you're in the right place. Buckle up, and prepare to be entertained in your learning regions.

item.title: About Canva
item.description:
About Canva

Easily create beautiful designs + documents. Use Canva's drag-and-drop feature and professional layouts to design consistently stunning graphics.

item.title: Supercharge Your Content Marketing: 12 Ways to Repurpose
item.description:
Supercharge Your Content Marketing: 12 Ways to Repurpose

Want the heads up when new stories drop? Subscribe Here Do you ever feel like you're on a treadmill? A "content creation" hamster wheel? It probably feels like as soon as you've created one piece of solid content, you have to move right on to the next one.

item.title: SumoMe, free tools to grow your website traffic.
item.description:
SumoMe, free tools to grow your website traffic.

Feb 10th, 2016 by Sarah Peterson I know you've wondered. You've seen articles and stories about people who double their conversion rates, entrepreneurs who tripled their lists, and tools that bring in 20-50%+ more daily email subscribers. And you're excited to try the strategies and tools out, but you still wonder...

item.title: Case Study: How to Repurpose One Video Into 8 Assets -
item.description:
Case Study: How to Repurpose One Video Into 8 Assets -

Robert Rose, CMI's Chief Strategy Officer, teaches marketers in all of his master classes: You're not creating a blog post, a video, or a white paper ... you are telling a story. That story can be told in a myriad of ways to help extend your content marketing strategy.

item.title: 4 Examples of an Evergreen Facebook Campaign Trigger
item.description:
4 Examples of an Evergreen Facebook Campaign Trigger

A little more than three weeks ago, I published a blog post about how to create an evergreen Facebook ad campaign. It was so popular that I'll be hosting a 90-minute virtual workshop on the topic this Wednesday for Power Hitters Club Members.

item.title: Free Revenue & Product Pricing Calculator
item.description:
Free Revenue & Product Pricing Calculator

You can enter your revenue goal above in the pricing calculator, or download it for free. My brain is pretty dumb. It doesn't function in the same way some of my very-analytical entrepreneur friends think. So I have to trick myself into thinking in certain ways.

item.title: Copywriting Resources, Tools, and Learning Recommendations
item.description:
Copywriting Resources, Tools, and Learning Recommendations

People ask me for recommendations all the time, so here's a nice little repository of the best things I like and where to find them. Most of these are copywriting related. 't hurt my ears after long use. I wear them for concentrating during writing sessions, sleeping, and planes.

item.title: SumoMe, free tools to grow your website traffic.
item.description:
SumoMe, free tools to grow your website traffic.

Feb 1st, 2016 by Sarah Peterson It's your biggest frustration. The thing that keeps you up at night. That makes you want to bang your head against the wall over, and over, and over... Not enough traffic. You can learn every conversion technique in the world but it will all be pointless if you have nobody to convert.
